title: Advent ready to offer Cobham guarantees as UK decision looms
text:
The US firm seeking to buy defence business Cobham is preparing to offer concessions to protect British national security, as the Government decides whether to approve the £4bn deal.

The Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) this afternoon handed its report on private equity firm Advent’s takeover of Cobham to the Business Secretary Andrea Leadsom.

The Business Secretary will now consider the CMA’s findings, which are set to be released when she announces her decision. This is expected to happen within days.
